author: Sun, JH; Yang, XM
adress: Zhejiang Univ, Sir Run Run Shaw Hosp, Sch Med, Dept Radiol, Hangzhou, Zhejiang, Peoples R China
title: Establishment and characterization of three stable Basal/HER2-positive breast cancer cell lines derived from Chinese breast carcinoma with identical missense mutations in the DNA-binding domain of TP53
